Plot: Based on the events during the Three Kingdoms period in Ancient China in which specifically told in the title, The Battle of Red Cliffs.


Humor with substance, subtle but fun, clever-wow-war scenes !, 11 July 2008

I thought this is going to be another sad China dark, kungfu focus film. 

I was surprise to see this film with quality in all level of entertainment. This is one film that is really made with intelligence. From conversation, strategy, film direction, and music. The war is so smartly planned out. And the best of all is that it is base on a true Chinese historical event with real characters back to life again. 

I can say this is one of the best movies I have watched in my life. Having this movie breaking up into two parts is a great move!!! This first part of the movie ended nicely. I am so glad they didn&#039;t try to put everything in to just one film

Go watch it, you will be laughing, clapping, wowing, touched, and heart pumping! It is a fully entertaining and intelligent film and super cool ! Definitely Oscar worthy !!!
